content:
Tommorrow will be discussing the following Observation trackers from ballot. The ballot commenters have been invited to the call. The proposed dispositions are listed below. See the trackers for follow up discussion to date.

GF#16187 Change+terminology+binding+strength+for+Observation.referenceRange.type (Ioana Singureanu) In Person
GF#16185 Change+terminology+binding+strength+for+Observation.dataAbsentReason+and+Observation.component.dataAbsentReason (Ioana Singureanu) In Person Not Persuasive
GF#16186 Change+terminology+binding+strength+for+Observation.interpretation+and+Observation.component.interpretation (Ioana Singureanu) In Person Not Persuasive
GF#16348 Add+ab+%22instant%27+choice+to+Obervation.effective%5Bx%5D+to+support+observation+date%2Ftime+generated+by+device (Ioana Singureanu) In Person Not Persuasive
GF#16350 Clarify+how+Observation.focus+could+be+represented+as+a+CodeablConcept (Ioana Singureanu) In Person Not Persuasive

Call info:

Participation Information
Phone Number: +1 515-739-1430
Participant Passcode: 294586

Notes
If not on FCC or not wanting to use VOIP, use the following dial-in:

Access Code: 294586

finishing up these trackers on next Tuesday's OO on fhir call: See follow up discussion in trackers for background.
